Subjective: Extreme fatigue for 2 months; sleeping a lot but waking up tired; possible shallow sleep; morning stiffness; muscle pain; back pain (lower back worse); no impact on sports; no weight loss.
Objective: BP 110/60; HR 60; lungs clear; abdomen normal; mild back discomfort.
Assessment: Non-specific fatigue syndrome; rule out anemia, thyroid dysfunction, inflammation; no signs of infection or cardiovascular issues.
Plan: Blood tests: anemia, thyroid function, inflammation markers
